IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_vaults') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_vaults GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_vaults @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM dbo.Guild_Vaults WHERE guild_id = @guild_id
SELECT id, name FROM dbo.Guild_Vaults WHERE guild_id = @guild_id ORDER BY id ASC
SET NOCOUNT OFF
